page.description: Generate a SQL Create Index statement for the table and index passed in.
page.syntax: SQL_Statement as C = GenerateCreateIndexStatement as C (TableInfo as SQL::TableInfo, IndexInfo as SQL::IndexInfo)

argument.name: SQL_Statement
argument.description: An add user group statement appropriate for the database.

page.discussion: The .GenerateCreateIndexStatement() method returns the SQL statement that will add an index to a table.
